name: Merbabies
summary: A salt water version of "Water Babies" (1935); adorable redheaded 'merbabies' materialize out of the crashing surf and proceed to the sea floor where they conduct a circus along with a variety of sea creatures.
info:
• 中文名: 人鱼宝宝
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1938-12-09
  • 片长: 9min
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Rudolf Ising / Vernon Stallings
